overview:
Prior to joining Saba, Pete Williams was a partner at Morrison & Foerster LLP, a leading international law firm.

Williams has extensive experience representing high-technology companies, as well as venture capital and investment banking firms.

In addition to private and public financing and acquisitions, Williams also specialized in technology and content development, licensing and distribution transactions, primarily for software and Internet companies.

Williams clients included Netscape, Sequoia Capital, Morgan Stanley and Merrill Lynch.

Williams has BAs from the University of California, Los Angeles and a JD from Santa Clara.
